actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 377, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary is considered as adopted.
purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 377, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary is considered as adopted.
